channel.title: How to make a 508/525 server
channel.description:
Hi today im going to teach you how to set up your 508/525 server.
First thing you want to do is download a source and a client Ive got a source & client right here that's good for starters : source : http://www.mediafire.com/?2v7s4rudzskc8rb client : http://www.mediafire.com/?l4ccwqa7acenbco
Okay the first thing you want to do is make sure you have java jdk and jre here the link for them: [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html[/url]
Once you have that you have to make sure your computer recognizes them. to do that (this is for windows vista) go to my computer and click on "view system information" [img]http://i833.photobucket.com/albums/zz253/wootitsme/info.jpg[/img]
Then click on advanced then "environment variables" [img]http://i833.photobucket.com/albums/zz253/wootitsme/var.jpg[/img]
when that menu opens up you will see "user variables for *****" and "system variables" [IMG]http://i833.photobucket.com/albums/zz253/wootitsme/var2.jpg[/img]
Under "user variables for *****" press new. and put this info in. under "variable name" put path And under "variable value" put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Under "system variables" press new. and put this info in. under "variable name" put "classpath" under "variable value" put ".;CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip"
Now for the actual running the server part. Open up your source. and go to bin you will see runserver and compile First right click runserver and click "edit" you will see this "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
change that 20 to 21(or what ever jdk you have)
do the same for compile. then double click runserver and your done your server is up!
NOTE IF YOU HAVE TO PORT FORWARD GO HERE GREAT THING FOR AUTO PORTFORWARDING : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html[/url]
Some tut's ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Making yourself owner To make yourself owner go to your source and then enter thing in the browser bar. C:\Documents and Settings\name of you account on computer\Desktop\starter source\Starter source\src\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler after that click commands.java and ctrl+f search if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("your name")) { then replace "your name" with your username , save and compile and your owner!. (pm me and ill send you the code to add a co-owner)
Changing what it says when a person logs on. To change what it says when some body logs on put this in your browser bar in your source. C:\Documents and Settings\name of your account on your computer\Desktop\starter source\Starter source\src\net\com\codeusa\test then click testworldloader and ctrl+f search for: "put ur info here" then change all of those to what you want it to say when somebody logs on.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 30% credits to me for adding customs to client and adding stuff to source. 70% to whoever made the client and source.
reply if you liked this guide :D

item.title: How to make a 508/525 server
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

item.title: How to make a 508/525 server
item.dc:creator: @gfk1d gfk1d
item.description:
@gfk1d wrote:

Hi today im going to teach you how to set up your 508/525 server.

First thing you want to do is download a source and a client
Ive got a source & client right here that’s good for starters :
source : http://www.mediafire.com/?2v7s4rudzskc8rb
client : http://www.mediafire.com/?l4ccwqa7acenbco

Okay the first thing you want to do is make sure you have java jdk and jre
here the link for them: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html

Once you have that you have to make sure your computer recognizes them.
to do that (this is for windows vista) go to my computer and click on “view system information”

Then click on advanced then “environment variables”

when that menu opens up you will see “user variables for *****” and “system variables”

Under “user variables for *****” press new. and put this info in.
under “variable name” put path
And under “variable value” put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin.


Under "system variables" press new. and put this info in.
under "variable name" put "classpath"
under "variable value" put ".;CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip"

Now for the actual running the server part.
Open up your source.
and go to bin you will see runserver and compile 
First right click runserver and click "edit" you will see this "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

change that 20 to  21(or what ever jdk you have)

do the same for compile. then double click runserver and your done your server is up!

NOTE IF YOU HAVE TO PORT FORWARD GO HERE GREAT THING FOR AUTO PORTFORWARDING : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html[/url]


                                             Some tut's
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Making yourself owner
To make yourself owner go to your source and then enter thing in the browser bar. C:\Documents and Settings\name of you account on computer\Desktop\starter source\Starter source\src\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler after that click commands.java and ctrl+f search if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("your name")) { then replace "your name" with your username , save and compile and your owner!. (pm me and ill send you the code to add a co-owner)

Changing what it says when a person logs on.
To change what it says when some body logs on put this in your browser bar in your source.
C:\Documents and Settings\name of your account on your computer\Desktop\starter source\Starter source\src\net\com\codeusa\test then click testworldloader
and ctrl+f search for: "put ur info here" then change all of those to what you want it to say when somebody logs on.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
30% credits to me for adding customs to client and adding stuff to source.
70% to whoever made the client and source.


reply if you liked this guide :D

Read full topic
